bibl.title: assisted by Susanne Martinssen-von Falck, Clothing the House. Furnishing Textiles of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt and Neighbouring Countries. Proceedings of the 5th Conference of the Research Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 6-7 October 2007.
bibl.note: 14 contributions. - Pp. 8-15, 4 figg. coul.: A.D.M. and C.Fl., Textiles and Architecture - An Introduction. - Late Antique architecture in Egypt. - Furnishing textiles in written sources. - Furnishing textiles from excavations. - Furnishing textiles in museums and collections. - Depictions of furnishing textiles and architecture on works of art. - Individual reseach beyond the main theme. - Bibliography. Indices. Authors.
bibl.seg: De Moor Antoine and Cäcilia Fluck (Edd.), assisted by Susanne Martinssen-von Falck, Clothing the House. Furnishing Textiles of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt and Neighbouring Countries. Proceedings of the 5th Conference of the Research Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 6-7 October 2007.
Tielt, Lannoo, 2009, 4°, 205 pp., nombr. ill. coul. ISBN 978-90-209-85900-0. €40.

14 contributions. - Pp. 8-15, 4 figg. coul.: A.D.M. and C.Fl., Textiles and Architecture - An Introduction. - Late Antique architecture in Egypt. - Furnishing textiles in written sources. - Furnishing textiles from excavations. - Furnishing textiles in museums and collections. - Depictions of furnishing textiles and architecture on works of art. - Individual reseach beyond the main theme. - Bibliography. Indices. Authors.
